title: Lauren Boebert Is In Unexpectedly Tight House Race in Colorado
description: Representative Lauren Boebert, a Republican, is being challenged by Adam Frisch, a Democrat.
dc:creator: Emma Bubola
media:credit: William Woody for The New York Times
media:description: Representative Lauren Boebert of Colorado, a Republican, during a debate with her opponent, Adam Frisch, at Colorado Mesa University in Grand Junction, Colo., in September.
